Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Angela Antonia Suárez at a corporate retreat in Madrid. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Angela Antonia Suárez is a seasoned professional with over 14 years of experience.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Angela Antonia Suárez and Martín have been married since 2018. They are proud parents of 3 children: Gil, Lucía and Ortega.
Education Background:
Angela earned her secondary school diploma from IES Federico García Lorca Granada in 2006.
After that, she went on to study at ESADE Business & Law School until 2012.
Occupation History:
Angela Antonia Suárez is a 37 year old Regional Vice President from Spain.
Angela Antonia Suárez began her professional journey as a Hotel Manager at NH Hotel Group S.A. in 2011, laying the foundation for future success.
She then transitioned to Iberostar Hotels & Resorts S.A. as a General Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2015 to 2016.
From 2016 till now, she served as a Regional Vice President at NH Hotel Group S.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 130000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has flat located in Vigo, worth 700000 EUR.

She purchased flat in Oviedo, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 930000 EUR.
On top of that she inherited a beautiful flat in Zaragoza, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 890000 EUR.
In 2017, she received an inheritance of 810000 EUR from her late grandmother, who was a prominent Oil and Gas Executive, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
